name: OBIO
description:
Cyberspace is at risk of annihilation! When a deadly supervirus threatens the internet, it's up to you to stop it!

You must guide your OBIO Bots through each level without either of them being destroyed. Both OBIO Bots move at the same time though, so choose your moves carefully!

OBIO Features:

80+ LEVELS
Six different worlds, each with their own puzzles, themes, and special mechanics!

5 DIFFERENT POWER-UPS
OBIO Bots can collect special power-ups to enhance their abilities! Move two spaces instead of one, block lasers, phase through walls, and more!

TONS OF UNIQUE HAZARDS AND OBSTACLES
Your journey through cyberspace won't be easy! Viruses, firewalls, and deadly robot clones will stand in your way, all while you navigate teleporters, momentum spaces, movable blocks, and more!

Other features:
-Complete levels in as few moves as possible to get more stars!
-Make a wrong move? Undo to before you made it using one of your cookies!
-Stuck on a difficult level? Use one of your skip tokens to move onto the next one! Don't worry, you can come back to older levels any time!

Note: the itch.io version of OBIO contains greater quantities of collectables compared to the mobile versions and will contain all future bonus content at no added cost.
